column5: We have found a bait that works for us. Unfortunately it has been hard to get locally in BC. Can anyone help with where I can find sources online that ship to canada. I have tried cabelas and wholesale sports but neither have the specific bait i am looking for. If you know of any online shops that could help I would appreciate your assistance.BCKEVO
Here's one place....http://shopping.canoe.ca/shop/produc...d_4579710.html. Hint, do a Google search for Berkley Powerbait+Canada and you will get many more results to choose from.
